abstracts.cdata!:
The Financial Sector Adjustment Loan
            Project will support the efforts of the Government of
            Senegal to restructure its banking system and lay the
            groundwork for the development of well functioning financial
            and capital markets. It will take place within the framework
            of reforms by the West African Monetary Union (UMOA) of
            which Senegal is a member. The major objective of the
            project will be to restore and develop a well-functioning,
            broadly based financial sector of which is critical to
            continued progress in Senegal's structural adjustment
            efforts. The main goals will be: (a) to introduce
            institutional and systematic changes that should ensure
            against systemwide failure; (b) to restructure
            Senegal's insolvent banking sector; and (c) to set the
            stage for further improvements in the financial
            intermediation system.
